  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3233</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weak Learners in High School -Must they Read?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwache Anfänger in der High School - müssen 
sie lesen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants faibles dans le lycée - 
doivent-ils lire ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Learners fracos na High School - devem ler?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principianti deboli in High School - devono 
leggere?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αδύνατοι αρχάριοι στο γυμνάσιο - πρέπει να διαβάσουν;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Los principiantes débiles en High School 
secundaria - deben leer?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a thoughtful article for teachers on different approaches to different learners in learning to read.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein durchdachter Artikel für Lehrer auf 
unterschiedlichen Annäherungen zu den unterschiedlichen Anfängern 
beim Lernen zu lesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un article pensif pour des professeurs à 
différentes approches à différents étudiants dans l'étude pour 
lire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um artigo pensativo para professores em 
aproximações diferentes aos learners diferentes na aprendizagem ler.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un articolo premuroso per gli insegnanti sui 
metodi differenti ai principianti differenti nell'imparare leggere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα στοχαστικό άρθρο για τους δασκάλους 
στις διαφορετικές προσεγγίσεις στους διαφορετικούς αρχαρίους στην 
εκμάθηση να διαβάζει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un artículo pensativo para los profesores en 
diversos acercamientos a diversos principiantes en aprender leer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie di apprendimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
